usp.title: What makes {name} unique?
usp.description: At {name}}, we combine a passion for technology and mechanics with in-depth expertise in engineering and production.

items.title: Your Total Partner: From Engineering to Fabrication
items.description: {name}} offers a complete trajectory from concept, engineering and prototyping to process optimization. Everything under one roof for maximum efficiency.

items.title: Seamless Integration of Design and Production
items.description: Our engineers and production specialists work closely together. This guarantees manufacturable designs and a flawless trajectory from idea to end product.

items.title: Unique Expertise in Diverse Materials
items.description: Benefit from our broad material expertise in both metal and plastic for the best and most sustainable solution.

items.title: Driven by Optimization and Prototyping
items.description: {name}} excels in fast, iterative optimization. Validated concepts result in 'first time right' prototypes.

items.title: Efficiency in Production and Cost Savings
items.description: We proactively think along to analyze and improve your products for higher returns and lower costs.

items.title: Innovative Custom Solutions
items.description: Thanks to our unique combination of engineering knowledge and production techniques, we develop creative custom solutions.

items.title: Acquisition by {name}
items.description: Stronger together, with a shared focus on innovation and quality for the future.

features.title: What makes {name} so unique
features.description: At {name}}, we combine a passion for technology and mechanics with expertise in turning, milling and optimization. Thanks to our fully in-house process – from design and strength calculations to production – we offer solutions from A to Z. This makes {name}} the ideal partner for downtime or critical work.

items.title: Quick response to downtime
items.description: We understand that downtime costs money. Thanks to our short communication lines and efficient work structure, we can respond quickly and plan interventions.

items.title: Flexibility through extensive machinery
items.description: With a diverse and modern machine park, we are able to deliver custom work, even for complex or urgent assignments.

items.title: Short lead times
items.description: Through our internal processes and inventory management, we minimize waiting times and guarantee fast delivery.

items.title: Proactive and reactive investigation of machine breakdown
items.description: We perform thorough analyses via FEA and CFD to detect problems and prevent future defects.

faas.title: Factory as a Service (FaaS)
faas.description: Factory as a Service (FaaS), 'powered by' {name} and Leys NV. By joining forces, you benefit from lower fixed costs, faster time-to-market, high flexibility, reduced risk management, high quality, and predictability.

items.title: Lower fixed costs (CAPEX)
items.description: No large investments in your own factories or machines.

items.title: Faster time-to-market
items.description: Our workflows enable us to produce parts quickly so that the customer can assemble and deliver within days or weeks.

items.title: Flexibility & risk management
items.description: You only pay for actual consumption and can easily adjust designs.

items.title: High quality & predictability
items.description: Standardized, measurable processes ensure consistent, reliable results.
